title: Everything we know so far about the Apple Silicon 27-inch iMac replacement
content:
Apple plans to replace its 27-inch iMac with a new model featuring its own silicon, most likely the upcoming iMac Pro. As rumors point out that the company will probably unveil this new generation rather sooner than later, here’s everything we know so far about the product.

more…

The post Everything we know so far about the Apple Silicon 27-inch iMac replacement appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: As rumors point out, Apple will likely unveil a replacement for the 27-inch iMac in 2022. Here's everything we know so far about the product.
